events.message: The candidate submitted their application for the software engineer position, highlighting extensive experience in backend development and cloud technologies.
The recruitment team reviewed the application and classified it under the Engineering department based on the candidate’s skills and background.
A technical recruiter was assigned to manage the candidate’s recruitment process and coordinate the next steps including interviews.
The initial screening conversation was conducted; the candidate demonstrated strong knowledge in software architecture and problem solving.
The candidate responded promptly, confirming interest in progressing to the technical interview stage and availability for scheduling.
The technical interview was scheduled for next week, aiming to assess the candidate’s coding skills, system design, and relevant engineering experience.
